translation.en: I need to talk with the Israeli Prime Minister.
translation.ja: 〈イスラエル首相と話したい〉
イスラエル　テルアビブモサド庁舎失礼します イスラエル　テルアビブモサド庁舎
連絡はあった？ ええ

translation.en: [man] Thank you for coming this late.
This is George Seif, Radio Damascus.
A few minutes ago, our beloved president,
translation.ja: 数分前に― アル=ハーフィズ大統領より発表がありました

translation.en: Amin Al-Hafez, asked me to read this announcement.
translation.ja: アル=ハーフィズ大統領より発表がありました
スパイのエリ･コーエン…

translation.en: you do not remember your name?
translation.ja: 名前も覚えてないのか

translation.en: You do not know who you are.
translation.ja: 自分が誰か分からないのか

translation.en: I love you more than anything in the whole world.
But if you come home late tonight, I will kill you. Nadia.
translation.ja: “でも早く帰らないと殺すわよ　ナディア”

translation.en: [Eli] That is none of your business.
Nothing is too expensive for you, mon amour.
translation.ja: “君には高すぎる物などない”

translation.en: Now hurry up if you don't want to be late.
It was so cheap. It was half...
...battle heavily damages Tiberias on the Israeli-Syrian border.
translation.ja: シリア国境の町ティベリアは大被害

translation.en: This farming settlement or kibbutzim, lies in an area claimed by both nations.
translation.ja: この農地つまりキブツは両国が領土だと主張

translation.en: The fighting erupted quickly when Syrians allegedly fired
translation.ja: イスラエルの農家にシリアが発砲し―
イスラエルの農家にシリアが発砲し― 争いが勃発しました

translation.en: Israel used tanks, mortars and aircraft to counter-attack.
translation.ja: イスラエルは戦車迫撃砲や戦闘機で応戦

translation.en: -We don't have to go. -Syrian officials claim 70 Israelis killed
translation.ja: 中止しようか シリアは70人を殺害し―
イスラエルはＭｉＧ６機を撃墜

translation.en: Israel supplied this film, reportedly showing the dogfight in the sky...
translation.ja: この映像では空中戦の様子が見えます

translation.en: And the kids. I mean the kids.
Did they say how many casualties?
-Hi. -I've been looking for you all night.
translation.ja: ずっと捜してたんだよ

translation.en: I'm here with Nadia. You remember her?
You know my wife is absolutely infatuated with you, right?
translation.ja: うちの妻は君に夢中なんだよ

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -I mean, come on.
Could you get us a tonic water with a lemon twist, please?
translation.ja: トニックウォーターレモン入りで
自分には全く呆(あき)れたよ

translation.en: I'm fine, and to prove it,
I'm going to get us all a round of tonic water.
translation.ja: 全員にトニックウォーター

translation.en: The kids, I c-- I care so much about the kids."
translation.ja: “子どもたちのことが気になるの”

translation.en: They were nice to invite us.
Well, they invited us to add color to their party, Nadia. That's it.
translation.ja: パーティーに色をつけるためだ

translation.en: That's not true. She invited us because she likes me.
translation.ja: 仲良しだから招待したのよ

translation.en: She's your friend? You fix her dresses.
You're her employee. That's all. You're her maid.
translation.ja: ただの使用人だ　メイドだよ

translation.en: I didn't mean she's not your friend or she doesn't like you.
translation.ja: 友達じゃないとは言ってない

translation.en: -You think that because they have money-- -No, no.
It's because they think they're better than us.
With their stupid parties and their childish music.
translation.ja: バカなパーティーに ガキっぽい音楽

translation.en: They have no idea what I did in Egypt.
translation.ja: エジプトの事を知らず

translation.en: They think I'm just another immigrant.
translation.ja: ただの移民だと思ってる

translation.en: How would they know if you don't tell them?
translation.ja: 言わなきゃ分からないわ

translation.en: You sit quietly in the corner and expect everyone to guess.
translation.ja: 黙って座ってて言い当てろと？

translation.en: You know what they see when they look at me?
translation.ja: 彼らに私はどう見える？

translation.en: Can you do me a favor?
Can you get me some tonic water with a lemon twist?
translation.ja: トニックウォーターをレモン入りで

translation.en: [man] I'm sick and tired of burying my sons and daughters...
translation.ja: イスラエル　テルアビブ首相官邸若い子たちの埋葬には飽きた 若い子たちの埋葬には飽きた

translation.en: -There has to be a solution... -I quit.
...and I want to know what it is.
And if you can't give me the right answers,
I'll fetch someone who'll give them to me.
translation.ja: 答えられる人に聞くぞ

translation.en: Jacob, this can't continue like this. It cannot!
translation.ja: ジェイコブこのままはダメだ！

translation.en: We need to send someone there as soon as possible.
-It doesn't work that way. -Then make it work that way.
translation.ja: ムリです 何としてもやれ

translation.en: We have no one in there to tell us what's going on. We're completely blind and deaf.
translation.ja: 中からの情報がないと手探り状態だ

translation.en: I understand, but what you're talking about takes time.
translation.ja: しかし時間がかかります

translation.en: To build a reliable cover, train...
Uh... We're talking at least two years.
You have six months, not a day more.
You wanna go in there and tell him that right now?
translation.ja: 中に入ってそう報告するか？

translation.en: I'll walk with you. Come on.
Let me know the moment you identify an asset.
translation.ja: 候補を見つけたらすぐ知らせろ

translation.en: We've made this mistake once before.
translation.ja: 以前も同じ失敗をした

translation.en: Come with me. I want to show you something.
I'm not supposed to show it to you.
In the past five months, there were four attacks from the Syrian Golan on our villages.
translation.ja: この５か月でシリアのゴラン高原から攻撃が４回

translation.en: -The attacks are escalating. -I know all this.
translation.ja: 激化してる 知ってる

translation.en: These aerial images we got from our American friends
translation.ja: この航空画像は米軍から入手した

translation.en: show us the exact locations from where the Syrians are shooting.
translation.ja: シリアが攻撃してくる場所が正確に表れている

translation.en: these were taken one hour before...
translation.ja: これが１時間前の画像と…

translation.en: and after the most recent attack.
translation.ja: 最近の攻撃の直後の画像

translation.en: We think underground, but we're not sure.
The Syrians are trying to make us look the other way.
translation.ja: よそ見をさせるつもりだ

translation.en: Why? What are they up to?
We have no idea what they're building,
translation.ja: 何を作っているにせよ

translation.en: but I can assure you we're not going to like it.
translation.ja: 気に入らないことは間違いない

translation.en: The Golan is one of the most guarded places in the world.
translation.ja: ゴラン高原は世界一警備が厳重だ

translation.en: The Syrians don't let anyone in there. Not even their own.
translation.ja: シリアは自国民でさえ立ち入らせない

translation.en: We need eyes and ears on the other side of the border.
translation.ja: 向こう側に情報源が必要だ

translation.en: We owe our people the right to live in peace and security.
translation.ja: 国民は平和で安全に生きる権利がある

translation.en: In this land, that right doesn't come without a price.
translation.ja: この国では生活に犠牲が伴う

translation.en: And sometimes the price is high, as you very well know.
translation.ja: 時には犠牲が多すぎるのは分かるな

translation.en: Look, at least before you say no to me,
consider all the people we are responsible for.
translation.ja: 国民への責任を考えろ
アレクサンドリア育ち

translation.en: immigrated to Israel three years ago.
-And we disqualified him because... -We don't like volunteers. Too eager.
translation.ja: 断った理由は… 志願者は熱心すぎる

translation.en: And also because of his brother,

translation.ja: モーリスはエジプトのアナリスト

translation.en: Oh, he smuggled Jews from Egypt to Israel.
translation.ja: ユダヤ人を入国させた
いいな 家族も全員よ

translation.en: He joined them only years after. He stayed to help.
translation.ja: 彼は１年後に来た残ってたの

translation.en: arrested in connection with the Lavon Affair.
translation.ja: ラヴォン事件で逮捕された

translation.en: So he's got a record in Egypt.

translation.ja: じゃあ　他を探すわ

translation.en: Do you want me to send everyone home?
I thought we stopped doing that.
Desperate times call for desperate measures.
translation.ja: 危険な時には危ない手がいる

translation.en: I'm sorry I'm calling this late,
but I tried a few times.

translation.ja: ここにはもう電話しないで

translation.en: Explain the significance of this again.
I can teach anyone to transmit,
to make a bomb, to go undercover.
But a true agent has instinct, and that cannot be taught.
translation.ja: でも本物の諜報員の直感は教えられない

translation.en: He either has it or he doesn't.
So you gave him the wrong address.
translation.ja: だから間違った住所を

translation.en: An operative should sense that something is wrong,
translation.ja: 諜報員なら変だと気づく

translation.en: But there must be dozens of other windows facing him.
translation.ja: でも窓は他にもたくさんある

translation.en: And even if he knows this is a test,
how could he possibly know that...
Do you know who we are?
If I'm right, I applied to you twice before.
translation.ja: 想像通りなら以前２回応募し

translation.en: We want to offer you the opportunity to do something important with your life.
translation.ja: 非常に重要な仕事をオファーしたい

translation.en: Do you consider yourself a patriot?
translation.ja: 自分を愛国者だと思う？

translation.en: I love this country with all my might.
If your country needed you to quit your job,
translation.ja: 国が仕事を辞めろと言えば

translation.en: If your country needed you to quit your job,
translation.ja: 国が仕事を辞めろと言えば

translation.en: If your country needed you to lie to your friends, your family,
translation.ja: 国が家族や友人にウソをつけと言えば

translation.en: If your country asked you to risk your life,
translation.ja: 国が命を懸けろと言えば

translation.en: Nothing about this conversation is hypothetical.
translation.ja: この会話は仮定ではない

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, you will get up, pack your lunch,
translation.ja: 明朝 起きたら弁当を持ち

translation.en: kiss your wife goodbye, and come here without telling anyone.
translation.ja: 妻にキスをして誰にも言わずにここへ来い

translation.en: You'll begin working with me and my team.
translation.ja: 私のチームと働き始める

translation.en: In the next few days, you'll go through a series of tests,
translation.ja: 数日かけていろいろなテストをする

translation.en: you'll go through a period of training.
If, after that, you're found to be a good fit for us,
translation.ja: それで適性を確認したら

translation.en: I'd like to kill this machine. Before it kills me.
translation.ja: このミシン　いやになるわ

translation.en: Really, I have to finish this dress.
translation.ja: ドレスを仕上げなきゃ
後でだ エリったら

translation.en: Two of my agents are following us right now.
translation.ja: 諜報員２名に尾行されてる

translation.en: They've been following us for a while.
I want you to spot them before we get to that juice bar.
translation.ja: ジュース屋に着く前に見つけろ

translation.en: Don't let them see you know, that way you have an advantage.
translation.ja: 知ってると悟らせず利点にする

translation.en: and check the reflections whenever you can.
translation.ja: 窓に映った自分を見る

translation.en: Combines a high-velocity cannon with exceptional long-range endurance.
translation.ja: 高速砲と長距離耐久の組み合わせ

translation.en: This model has an entirely new, thinner,
translation.ja: 新機種で小型になった

translation.en: and more highly swept wing and tail plane
Our goal is 25 words a minute.

translation.ja: 14文字で３つ間違い もう一度
アフィフ･アル･ビズリ中尉

translation.en: Co-- I-- I mean, Colonel Afif Al-Bizri.
translation.ja: アフィフ･アル･ビズリ大佐だ

translation.en: The man in the brown shirt and short sleeves.
translation.ja: 茶色の半袖シャツの男

translation.en: Ahmed Suidani, head of secret police.
translation.ja: アハメド･スイダニ秘密警察署長

translation.en: The man with the green cap,
and the older woman by the vegetable stand.
There's no room for mistake, Eli.
He spotted the both of you.
I'm looking for my husband, Eli Cohen.
translation.ja: 夫のエリ･コーエンはいます？

translation.en: He needs to head up from the north.
-From the south or the north? -I couldn't spot it.
translation.ja: 南か北か？ 見つからない

translation.en: Everything is moving according to plan.
We need to move him faster into Buenos Aires.
translation.ja: 早くブエノスアイレスへ行かせるんだ

translation.en: -It's the perfect time to get in. -I can't agree to that.
translation.ja: 早くブエノスアイレスへ行かせるんだ できません

translation.en: Last I checked, you work for me.
His cover is not yet secured.
Cover is never perfect. People are dying while we wait.
translation.ja: 待ってる間に死者が出ている

translation.en: He's of no use in Damascus if he's not secure.
translation.ja: 確実でなければ役に立たない

translation.en: -Think of the risk of sending him. -The Prime Minister spent his morning
translation.ja: 送り込む危険を… 首相が今朝 訪問した

translation.en: consoling a mother who lost two of her children.
translation.ja: 首相が今朝 訪問した 子供を亡くした母

translation.en: A nine year-old girl who lost both her parents and both her legs.
translation.ja: 両親と両足を失った９歳の女の子もだ

translation.en: A Swedish volunteer who lost her eyesight
translation.ja: スウェーデン人は失明だ

translation.en: because she came to this country to help pick tomatoes.
translation.ja: 来た理由は収穫の手伝いだ

translation.en: Are you working on your cover?
-I thought you were done for the day? -I am.
They seem to have a revolution every two months.
We like to joke that the leader is the first Syrian officer to get to the radio in the morning,
translation.ja: “大統領だと宣言した者勝ちだ”と

translation.en: Tomorrow I'm scheduled to hand in your report to Jacob.
translation.ja: 明日 君の報告書を提出する

translation.en: It says you passed all the exams,
and that you're ready to be operational.
You have 24 hours to think about it.
And I want you to really take your time and think about it.
translation.ja: 時間をかけてよく考えるんだ

translation.en: If you come back and say yes, I'll hand in the report and you'll begin working undercover.
translation.ja: やりたいなら報告しスパイとして働き始める

translation.en: But if you say you've decided you don't want to pursue this,
translation.ja: でもやりたくないなら―

translation.en: Say that you've been found an unlikely candidate.
translation.ja: 候補者として不適合だったと

translation.en: You want me to say no?
This is your life we're talking about.
translation.ja: 君の命の話をしている

translation.en: I want you to know you're not obligated to do this.
translation.ja: これをする義務は君にはない

translation.en: It's a bit late for that.
Your mother told me once that when a man brings his wife flowers,
translation.ja: お義母さんが言ってた 妻に花は浮気の証拠と
妻に花は浮気の証拠と

translation.en: [laughs] That sounds exactly like my mother.
-Who are you cheating on me with? -What...
I went to the store today to visit you.
They told me you haven't worked there for months.
translation.ja: 何か月も来てないって

translation.en: I'm sorry, I should've... told you before.
translation.ja: もっと早く言うべきだった

translation.en: I just wanted to make sure that they offered me the job before I got you excited.
translation.ja: 仕事を得てから喜ばせたくて

translation.en: To be... What is it again?
I'll be traveling all around the world...

translation.ja: イスラエルの武器もだ

translation.en: Eli, if this is about money, I can get another job.
translation.ja: エリ　お金が理由なら私が働くわ

translation.en: No, I will not have my wife work two jobs.
translation.ja: 妻に仕事を２つもさせない

translation.en: for me to give you the life that I promised you, Nadi.
translation.ja: 約束した生活をさせる機会なんだ

translation.en: Will you be gone for a long period of time?
translation.ja: 長期間 留守にするの？

translation.en: If I prove myself over the next few years, who knows, they might even make me an ambassador,
translation.ja: 数年で実力を発揮すれば大使になれるかもしれない

translation.en: and that means that you will be Mrs. Ambassador Cohen.
translation.ja: つまり君はコーエン大使夫人になる

translation.en: So why did you go to visit my old work?
translation.ja: なぜ昔の職場に行った？

translation.en: I just happened to be nearby.
translation.ja: たまたま近くにいたの
やあ　サリンジャーだ

translation.en: It's stupid. My wife and I, we...
We write each other letters and we leave them in silly places.
translation.ja: 手紙を書いて変な場所に隠すんです

translation.en: Read it and give it to me.
Eli, I love you more than anything in the whole wide world,
translation.ja: “エリ　世界で一番好きよ”

translation.en: She said she loves my mustache.
He's arrived. He's getting debriefed as we speak.
translation.ja: 到着して報告を受けてるわ

translation.en: So I guess Mrs. Burek is uninterested in my bribes?
translation.ja: ブレクさんは賄賂などいらないと

translation.en: What happened to him was not your fault.
translation.ja: あなたのせいじゃない

translation.en: We lost an agent. It happens.
translation.ja: 諜報員の死はよくある

translation.en: You know, the first time I saw Mrs. Burek
translation.ja: ブレクさんとの初対面は―

translation.en: was when I delivered the bad news.
translation.ja: 訃報を告げた時だった

translation.en: Before that, I didn't know what she looked like.
translation.ja: その前は顔も知らなかった

translation.en: It was easier that way. Clean, efficient.
translation.ja: その方が効率的で楽だ

translation.en: It's way above my pay grade,
translation.ja: 私の等級より上だし質問すべきでないかも

translation.en: and maybe I shouldn't even ask this question, but...
translation.ja: 私の等級より上だし質問すべきでないかも でも…

translation.en: aren't we risking him being exposed to more people than he should be?
translation.ja: 多くの人に触れると彼が危険じゃない？

translation.en: Argentina is the most important Arab expat center.
translation.ja: アルゼンチンは重要なアラブ人居住国

translation.en: It's the ideal place for Eli
to create relationships within the Arab community in a more controlled environment.
translation.ja: 制御された環境でアラブ社会とコネを作れる
カメル･アミン･タベット

translation.en: My name is Kamel Amin Thaabeth.
translation.ja: 私はカメル･アミン･タベット

translation.en: I was named after my father,
My mother's name is Sa'ida Abrahim.
translation.ja: アルゼンチンブエノスアイレスエセイサ国際空港母の名はサイード･アイブラヒム

translation.en: They were both born in Damascus,
translation.ja: 両親はダマスカス出身

translation.en: but moved to Beirut looking for work.
translation.ja: 仕事を求めベイルートに引越

translation.en: That is where I was born... in 1915.
translation.ja: そこで私は1915年に生まれた

translation.en: Eventually... my parents moved to Buenos Aires...
translation.ja: 最終的に両親はブエノスアイレスに移民

translation.en: where my father owned a very big textile factory on Legazzi Street.
translation.ja: 父はレガツィ通りの大きな織物工場を経営

translation.en: That is where I live now.
[in Arabic] May he rest in peace...
[in English] ...I took over the business, and, I'm proud to say,
translation.ja: 事業を継ぎ 今では―

translation.en: it became one of the most prominent textile companies in South America.
translation.ja: 南米屈指の織物会社に成長させたことが自慢だ

translation.en: [in Arabic] May she rest in peace...
I do not have any brothers or sisters.
I had an older sister, but...
she passed away when I was three years old.
I've never been to Damascus myself.
translation.ja: ダマスカスは未訪問だ

translation.en: I fell in love with it through the stories my father told me.
translation.ja: 父の話を聞いて大好きな国だ

translation.en: I am the biggest patriot of my beloved country.
translation.ja: 祖国をこの上なく愛してる

translation.en: I feel it is now time...
to contribute in whatever way I can.
translation.ja: 貢献すべきだと感じている

translation.en: I believe that I can make a difference.
translation.ja: 変化をもたらすことができる

translation.en: [Rabbi Endebbo] We don't have much time. Please.
